Инструкции по работе с программами электронной подписи и шифрования
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications

How to work with digital signature and encryption applications

Уникальное представление сертификата используется в полях выбора при шифровании. Оно формируется из фамилии, имени, организации, должности и срока действия. Например: "Иванов Иван, ООО 1С, Программист, до 03.2017".
Когда у пользователя два сертификата от разных удостоверяющих центров (УЦ), тогда представление нужно дополнить именем УЦ. Например: "Иванов Иван, ООО 1С, Программист, до 03.2017, УЦ 1С".
Когда сертификат используется для специальной цели разными пользователями, тогда представление нужно заменить на описание этой цели, например: "Для шифрования счетов-фактур, до 05.2019", "Для шифрования налоговой отчетности, до 12.2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice encryption, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting encryption, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice encryption, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting encryption, until 12/2015".

In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
